search_results.title: Og Mandino
search_results.snippet: Augustine "Og" Mandino II (December 12, 1923 – September 3, 1996) was an American author and salesman. He wrote the bestselling book The Greatest Salesman ...

search_results.snippet: Og Mandino is the most widely read inspirational and self-help author in the world today. In 1976, at the age of fifty-two, he shocked the publishing industry.
